About

VoidStar Security LLC is a security research and consulting firm with a specialization in firmware extraction and analyis. Background in ... Founded by ... We offer educational materials focused on embedded systems and firmware analysis. See our services

Services

Training

We provide practical training materials to equip you with the skills to need to navigate the digital landscape of computer security. We can also work closely with your organization to develop a training program that suits your specific mission.

Tool Development

Customized tooling to assist with vulnerability research, system emulation, reverse engineering or exploit development. GHIDRA LOADER, EMULATION WRITEUP,

Red Teaming / Reverse Engineering

Is your firmware securely stored on your IoT or embedded device? Are your hardware debugging mechanisms properly secured? Our hardware analysis program will provide you with these answers and recommendations on how to harden your product and develop an appropriate threat model.
